summary:
The guitar is a popular musical instrument with strings that you play by strumming or plucking. It usually has six strings and is held against your body. You use one hand to press the strings against frets to make different notes, and the other hand to strum or pick the strings.

There are different types of guitars, like acoustic (which has a hollow body) and electric (which needs an amplifier to be heard). Guitars are used in many music genres, such as rock, blues, jazz, and pop.
title: Guitar
